item.description: [[notes/raw]]
[[notes/raw]]
[[notes/raw]]
[[notes/raw]] [[notes/FoodCo]]

[[notes/raw]] Accounting software to run a farm company nyc 11-50 employees functionality bookkeeping keep track of real time transactions; schedule f invoicing automated expense reporting / cards analytics for cashflow management funding advisors for grants, loans, and other assistance.
Niche Vertical SAAS Size Processed over 100M in farm orders, 2000+ farmers, and 1M+ buyers. Location Seattle Crop All sorts, I think Online?
[[notes/raw]]
[[notes/raw]] https://dyson.cornell.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2019/06/smart-marketing-2019-06.pdf
[[notes/raw]] [[moc]] Books Film Links

[[notes/raw]] https://dyson.cornell.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2019/03/smart-marketing-2019-03.pdf CEA in urban areas has received a lot of recent investment. total costs in chicago/nyc are markedly higher than those with field-based production in california.
[[notes/raw]]
[[notes/raw]] CSA Models: https://home.localfoodmarketplace.com/4-models-of-customizable-farm-shares/
https://www.eatfromfarms.com/ “EFF” software Demo: https://dfm.eatfromfarms.com/product/sirloin-steaks 6M Revenue/year

[[notes/raw]] http://publications.dyson.cornell.edu/docs/smartMarketing/pdfs/SmrtMkg%20Mar2014.pdf?_gl=1re7umn_gcl_auMTYxOTgzNzM0OC4xNjkyNDIwMDY1_gaMTU1NDA4NTUyMS4xNjg4NTg1MzA4_ga_PJ9SLZ1H8W*MTY5MjQyMDA2NC4xLjEuMTY5MjQyMDkwMy41MS4wLjA. Most farmers market managers are not compensated.

[[notes/raw]] Workouts foundation training hybrid calisthenics Workouts from the Trainer Bose Ball 3x20 crossover bicycles (great abs) 22lbs pressure back cable rows 30lbs (15x2) squats with kettlebells Supermans 2x20
[[notes/raw]] To establish a food hub, a county needs around 182k residents to break even, but a wholesaler only needs 105k.

[[notes/raw]] Make it easy to sell local food online, build relationships, improve margins. Gain loyal customers. features zip code matching (match with sellers in local area) customers buy directly from farm (online branded store) they have partnerships with marketplaces to increase visibility can set up online market in “about 2 weeks” – have zoom meetings with vendors (farmers market manager) add pick up locations and new products – can update on desktop, tablet, phone pre-ordering and market pick up at food markets highlight vendors by individual story, not by price.
Competitor Table Link [[notes/Seven Suns]] [[notes/Barn2Door]] [[notes/Bold Salt Lick]] Complaint about Barn2Door [[notes/Eat From Farms]] EcWID [[notes/Food4All]] [[Meicai]]
[[notes/raw]] https://view.publitas.com/nutiani/report-nutiani-the-global-state-of-health-wellbeing-vol-2/page/1

[[notes/raw]] https://www.notion.so/aeonneo/Segmentations-705e25e58b5243e5853e1f5c13ff5702?pvs=4#aacc702bb95d4ade8da1f72944207e0a Many cafeterias are no longer independently operated, but turn to food service companies. The big three are Aramark, Chartwells, and Sodexo.
[[notes/raw]] https://www.cultivatingyourmarket.com/
[[notes/raw]]

Overview FoodCo is a project I’m working on within [[notes/Polly Labs]] TODOs Develop competitor analysis table [[notes/FoodCo Competitor Analysis]] [[notes/FoodCo Distributor Analysis]] [[notes/FoodCo Price Analysis]] [[notes/FoodCo Farmer Marketing Analysis]] [[notes/FoodCo Customer Analysis]] [[notes/CSA]]
[[notes/raw]] https://www.foraged.com/categories One single store that aggregates multiple producers for a single consumer.
[[notes/raw]] [[notes/Art]] mexican painter [[Mexicayotl Movement]] Mexican communist party Icon for Chicanos, feminism, and LGBTQ+ community Derived inspiration from [[notes/Hieronymus Bosch]]
[[notes/raw]] [[notes/Art]] New Mexico Red Canna Paintings Influenced by design/composition in Japanese art, away from realism. Helped establish [[American Modernism]].
[[notes/raw]]
https://avrdc.org/download/publications/from_the_field/agribusiness-value-chains/7-Steps-Practical-Guide_FACT-SHEET-rev2.pdf [[notes/raw]]

[[notes/raw]] Ongoing Work Analytics Track if people are coming from Mobile Ask Igor to do AA-6053 (Track/surface if they’re coming from JoinApp) Enable one-click copy/paste Track who is coming from JFS Better understand how JFS members are coming in (email) Streamline Job Upload (in progress)
[[notes/raw]] https://home.localfoodmarketplace.com/ Enable scale via collaboration. Demand for cooperative hub resources led to over 3000 local products for 300 orders per week.
[[notes/raw]] tl;dr: Local orbit helps you run a food hub. You can manage multiple marketplaces, price goods, create inventory/route planningjjjk
Projects are denoted by tags. This segments how I think about my life, and can be quickly changed. Ideas are linked by topic (wikipedia-style).
[[notes/raw]]
